subject: Fashion
title: Warp and Weft Basics
description: Learn Warp and Weft Basics in one minute.

hook.text: Every woven fabric on Earth follows the same two-thread principle.

buildup.text: Vertical threads are the warp. Horizontal threads crossing over are the weft.

discovery.text: Changing how warp and weft interlace creates completely different fabrics.

twist.text: This simple system is over 10,000 years oldâ€”predating pottery and metal.

climax.text: Modern looms weave at 2,000 picks per minute using the same principle.

punchline.text: Two directions, infinite fabrics. Simplicity scales.
